content:
vlkv opened issue #5415:

Hello,

Is it possible to use dynamic linking in Go host, similar to this example https://docs.wasmtime.dev/examples-rust-linking.html (which demonstrates Rust host)?

alexcrichton commented on issue #5415:

I believe this issue is an issue for the wasmtime-go bindings, so I'd recommend following this issue. Given that this is related to wasmtime-go and tracked over there, though, I'm going to close the version here in this repository.

alexcrichton closed issue #5415:

Hello,

Is it possible to use dynamic linking in Go host, similar to this example https://docs.wasmtime.dev/examples-rust-linking.html (which demonstrates Rust host)?

vlkv commented on issue #5415:

I do not understand why do you think this issue is related to my question. So I will go to the wasmtime-go project and ask there then. Thank you.
